pageProduct.name: Silicea One a Day 30 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Original Silicea Capsules for healthy skin, hair, nail and connective tissue, tendons and ligaments. It also helps to maintain strong bones and teeth. Supports the assimilation of calcium into bones.

Original Body Essential Silicea Capsules contain Silicon which gives structure to living things throughout the plant and animal kingdom, and is therefore important to the human body. A compound of oxygen and silicon...Silica as Silicon Dioxide is a natural element colloidal substance.

No Preservatives
GM Free
Not Tested on Animals
Suitable for Vegans & Vegetarians
Quick & Easy when you're on the Go

Ingredients

Each Capsule Contains:

420mg Silicon Dioxide (Silicon 196mg)

Directions

Adults take 1 capsule daily with a glass of water.

Store below 30 Deg C.

Keep out of reach of children.

Do not use if blister seal is broken.
